front.title: Further Mitigating Router ND Cache Exhaustion DoS Attacks Using Solicited-Node Group Membership

abstract.t: For each of their IPv6 unicast or anycast addresses, nodes join a Solicited-Node multicast group, formed using the lower 24 bits of the address. This Solicited-Node group membership could be used by routers to further mitigate a Neighbor Discovery cache Denial of Service attack.
